state.code:
flowchart TD
    A[User types in the text field] --> B[User clicks the Save button]
    B --> C[Browser sends POST request to server with new note data]
    C --> D[Server processes the new note and stores it]
    D --> E[Server responds with updated data or confirmation]
    E --> F[Browser updates the page with the new note displayed]

    %% Optional comments to explain steps
    %% The text entered by the user is included in the POST request.
    %% The server returns either a success message or the new list of notes.
